verses.verse: וְזֹ֥את <S%H2063><s%> likewise תּוֹרַ֖ת <S%H8451><s%> Likewise this [is] the law הָאָשָׁ֑ם <S%H817><s%> of the trespass offering קֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> it [is] most קָֽדָשִׁ֖ים <S%H6944><s%> holy הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

בִּמְק֗וֹם <S%H4725><s%> In the place אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> where יִשְׁחֲטוּ֙ <S%H7819><s%> where they kill אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָ֣עֹלָ֔ה <S%H5930><s%> the burnt offering יִשְׁחֲט֖וּ <S%H7819><s%> shall they kill אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָשָׁ֑ם <S%H817><s%> the trespass offering וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּמ֛וֹ <S%H1818><s%> and the blood יִזְרֹ֥ק <S%H2236><s%> thereof shall he sprinkle עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> upon the altar סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> round about

וְאֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חֶלְבּ֖וֹ <S%H2459><s%> of it all the fat יַקְרִ֣יב <S%H7126><s%> And he shall offer מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> הָֽאַלְיָ֔ה <S%H451><s%> thereof the rump וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֵ֖לֶב <S%H2459><s%> and the fat הַֽמְכַסֶּ֥ה <S%H3680><s%> that covereth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַקֶּֽרֶב׃ <S%H7130><s%> the inwards

וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> And the two הַכְּלָיֹ֔ת <S%H3629><s%> kidneys וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֵ֙לֶב֙ <S%H2459><s%> and the fat אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עֲלֵיהֶ֔ן <S%H5921><s%> is on אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is on הַכְּסָלִ֑ים <S%H3689><s%> that [is] on them which [is] by the flanks וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיֹּתֶ֙רֶת֙ <S%H3508><s%> and the caul עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַכָּבֵ֔ד <S%H3516><s%> [that is] above the liver עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> with הַכְּלָיֹ֖ת <S%H3629><s%> with the kidneys יְסִירֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H5493><s%> it shall he take away

וְהִקְטִ֨יר <S%H6999><s%> shall burn אֹתָ֤ם <S%H853><s%> הַכֹּהֵן֙ <S%H3548><s%> And the priest הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חָה <S%H4196><s%> them upon the altar אִשֶּׁ֖ה <S%H801><s%> [for] an offering made by fire לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אָשָׁ֖ם <S%H817><s%> it [is] a trespass offering הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> Every זָכָ֥ר <S%H2145><s%> Every male בַּכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> among the priests יֹאכְלֶ֑נּוּ <S%H398><s%> shall eat בְּמָק֤וֹם <S%H4725><s%> place קָדוֹשׁ֙ <S%H6918><s%> in the holy יֵאָכֵ֔ל <S%H398><s%> thereof it shall be eaten קֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> it [is] most קָֽדָשִׁ֖ים <S%H6944><s%> holy הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

כַּֽחַטָּאת֙ <S%H2403><s%> As the sin offering כָּֽאָשָׁ֔ם <S%H817><s%> [is] so [is] the trespass offering תּוֹרָ֥ה <S%H8451><s%> law אַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> [there is] one לָהֶ֑ם הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> for them the priest אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who יְכַפֶּר־ <S%H3722><s%> that maketh atonement בּ֖וֹ ל֥וֹ יִהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> shall have

וְהַ֨כֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest הַמַּקְרִ֖יב <S%H7126><s%> that offereth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֹ֣לַת <S%H5930><s%> burnt offering אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> any man's ע֤וֹר <S%H5785><s%> shall have to himself the skin הָֽעֹלָה֙ <S%H5930><s%> of the burnt offering אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which הִקְרִ֔יב <S%H7126><s%> which he hath offered לַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> [even] the priest ל֥וֹ יִהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> shall have

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every מִנְחָ֗ה <S%H4503><s%> And all the meat offering אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> is תֵּֽאָפֶה֙ <S%H644><s%> that is baken בַּתַּנּ֔וּר <S%H8574><s%> in the oven וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and everything נַעֲשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> and all that is dressed בַמַּרְחֶ֖שֶׁת <S%H4227><s%> and in the pan וְעַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> in מַחֲבַ֑ת <S%H4802><s%> in the fryingpan לַכֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> shall be the priest's הַמַּקְרִ֥יב <S%H7126><s%> that offereth אֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> ל֥וֹ תִֽהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> shall belong

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> Every מִנְחָ֥ה <S%H4503><s%> And every meat offering בְלוּלָֽה־ <S%H1101><s%> mingled בַשֶּׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> with oil וַחֲרֵבָ֑ה <S%H2720><s%> and dry לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all בְּנֵ֧י <S%H1121><s%> shall all the sons אַהֲרֹ֛ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron תִּהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> shall belong אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> have one כְּאָחִֽיו׃ <S%H251><s%> [as much] as another פ

וְזֹ֥את <S%H2063><s%> likewise תּוֹרַ֖ת <S%H8451><s%> And this [is] the law זֶ֣בַח <S%H2077><s%> of the sacrifice הַשְּׁלָמִ֑ים <S%H8002><s%> of peace offerings אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which יַקְרִ֖יב <S%H7126><s%> which he shall offer לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

אִ֣ם <S%H518><s%> If עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> way תּוֹדָה֮ <S%H8426><s%> it for a thanksgiving יַקְרִיבֶנּוּ֒ <S%H7126><s%> If he offer וְהִקְרִ֣יב ׀ <S%H7126><s%> then he shall offer עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> along זֶ֣בַח <S%H2077><s%> with the sacrifice הַתּוֹדָ֗ה <S%H8426><s%> of thanksgiving חַלּ֤וֹת <S%H2471><s%> cakes מַצּוֹת֙ <S%H4682><s%> unleavened בְּלוּלֹ֣ת <S%H1101><s%> mingled בַּשֶּׁ֔מֶן <S%H8081><s%> with oil וּרְקִיקֵ֥י <S%H7550><s%> wafers מַצּ֖וֹת <S%H4682><s%> and unleavened מְשֻׁחִ֣ים <S%H4886><s%> anointed בַּשָּׁ֑מֶן <S%H8081><s%> with oil וְסֹ֣לֶת <S%H5560><s%> of fine flour מֻרְבֶּ֔כֶת <S%H7246><s%> fried חַלֹּ֖ת <S%H2471><s%> and cakes בְּלוּלֹ֥ת <S%H1101><s%> mingled בַּשָּֽׁמֶן׃ <S%H8081><s%> with oil

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> with חַלֹּת֙ <S%H2471><s%> Besides the cakes לֶ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread חָמֵ֔ץ <S%H2557><s%> leavened יַקְרִ֖יב <S%H7126><s%> he shall offer קָרְבָּנ֑וֹ <S%H7133><s%> [for] his offering עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> with זֶ֖בַח <S%H2077><s%> with the sacrifice תּוֹדַ֥ת <S%H8426><s%> of thanksgiving שְׁלָמָֽיו׃ <S%H8002><s%> of his peace offerings

וְהִקְרִ֨יב <S%H7126><s%> And of it he shall offer מִמֶּ֤נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> one מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of every קָרְבָּ֔ן <S%H7133><s%> out of the whole oblation תְּרוּמָ֖ה <S%H8641><s%> [for] an heave offering לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD לַכֹּהֵ֗ן <S%H3548><s%> [and] it shall be the priest's הַזֹּרֵ֛ק <S%H2236><s%> that sprinkleth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דַּ֥ם <S%H1818><s%> the blood הַשְּׁלָמִ֖ים <S%H8002><s%> of the peace offerings ל֥וֹ יִהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> shall belong

וּבְשַׂ֗ר <S%H1320><s%> And the flesh זֶ֚בַח <S%H2077><s%> of the sacrifice תּוֹדַ֣ת <S%H8426><s%> for thanksgiving שְׁלָמָ֔יו <S%H8002><s%> of his peace offerings בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> the same day קָרְבָּנ֖וֹ <S%H7133><s%> that it is offered יֵאָכֵ֑ל <S%H398><s%> shall be eaten לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not יַנִּ֥יחַ <S%H3240><s%> he shall not leave מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> any עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until בֹּֽקֶר׃ <S%H1242><s%> any of it until the morning

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if נֶ֣דֶר ׀ <S%H5088><s%> [be] a vow א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or נְדָבָ֗ה <S%H5071><s%> or a voluntary offering זֶ֚בַח <S%H2077><s%> But if the sacrifice קָרְבָּנ֔וֹ <S%H7133><s%> of his offering בְּי֛וֹם <S%H3117><s%> the same day הַקְרִיב֥וֹ <S%H7126><s%> that he offereth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זִבְח֖וֹ <S%H2077><s%> his sacrifice יֵאָכֵ֑ל <S%H398><s%> it shall be eaten וּמִֽמָּחֳרָ֔ת <S%H4283><s%> and on the morrow וְהַנּוֹתָ֥ר <S%H3498><s%> also the remainder מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> of it יֵאָכֵֽל׃ <S%H398><s%> of it shall be eaten

וְהַנּוֹתָ֖ר <S%H3498><s%> But the remainder מִבְּשַׂ֣ר <S%H1320><s%> of the flesh הַזָּ֑בַח <S%H2077><s%> of the sacrifice בַּיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <S%H7992><s%> on the third בָּאֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> with fire יִשָּׂרֵֽף׃ <S%H8313><s%> shall be burnt

וְאִ֣ם <S%H518><s%> if הֵאָכֹ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> all manner יֵ֠אָכֵל <S%H398><s%> be eaten מִבְּשַׂר־ <S%H1320><s%> And if [any] of the flesh זֶ֨בַח <S%H2077><s%> of the sacrifice שְׁלָמָ֜יו <S%H8002><s%> of his peace offerings בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁי֮ <S%H7992><s%> on the third לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יֵרָצֶה֒ <S%H7521><s%> it shall not be accepted הַמַּקְרִ֣יב <S%H7126><s%> unto him that offereth אֹת֗וֹ <S%H853><s%> לֹ֧א <S%H3808><s%> it יֵחָשֵׁ֛ב <S%H2803><s%> neither shall it be imputed ל֖וֹ פִּגּ֣וּל <S%H6292><s%> it it shall be an abomination יִהְיֶ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> become וְהַנֶּ֛פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> and the soul הָאֹכֶ֥לֶת <S%H398><s%> at all מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> any עֲוֹנָ֥הּ <S%H5771><s%> his iniquity תִּשָּֽׂא׃ <S%H5375><s%> of it shall bear

וְהַבָּשָׂ֞ר <S%H1320><s%> And the flesh אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> that יִגַּ֤ע <S%H5060><s%> that toucheth בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> anything טָמֵא֙ <S%H2931><s%> any unclean לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יֵֽאָכֵ֔ל <S%H398><s%> [thing] shall not be eaten בָּאֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> with fire יִשָּׂרֵ֑ף <S%H8313><s%> it shall be burnt וְהַ֨בָּשָׂ֔ר <S%H1320><s%> and as for the flesh כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> anyone טָה֖וֹר <S%H2889><s%> all that be clean יֹאכַ֥ל <S%H398><s%> shall eat בָּשָֽׂר׃ <S%H1320><s%> flesh

וְהַנֶּ֜פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> But the soul אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who תֹּאכַ֣ל <S%H398><s%> that eateth בָּשָׂ֗ר <S%H1320><s%> [of] the flesh מִזֶּ֤בַח <S%H2077><s%> of the sacrifice הַשְּׁלָמִים֙ <S%H8002><s%> of peace offerings אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which לַיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> that [pertain] unto the LORD וְטֻמְאָת֖וֹ <S%H2932><s%> having his uncleanness עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> and וְנִכְרְתָ֛ה <S%H3772><s%> shall be cut off הַנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> upon him even that soul הַהִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> he מֵעַמֶּֽיהָ׃ <S%H5971><s%> from his people

וְנֶ֜פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Moreover the soul כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When תִגַּ֣ע <S%H5060><s%> that shall touch בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> anything טָמֵ֗א <S%H2931><s%> or [any] unclean בְּטֻמְאַ֤ת <S%H2932><s%> any unclean אָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> of man א֣וֹ ׀ <S%H176><s%> or בִּבְהֵמָ֣ה <S%H929><s%> beast טְמֵאָ֗ה <S%H2931><s%> unclean א֚וֹ <S%H176><s%> or בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any שֶׁ֣קֶץ <S%H8263><s%> or any abominable טָמֵ֔א <S%H2931><s%> unclean וְאָכַ֛ל <S%H398><s%> [thing] and eat מִבְּשַׂר־ <S%H1320><s%> of the flesh זֶ֥בַח <S%H2077><s%> of the sacrifice הַשְּׁלָמִ֖ים <S%H8002><s%> of peace offerings אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> which [pertain] unto the LORD וְנִכְרְתָ֛ה <S%H3772><s%> shall be cut off הַנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> even that soul הַהִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> he מֵעַמֶּֽיהָ׃ <S%H5971><s%> from his people פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

דַּבֵּ֛ר <S%H1696><s%> Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any חֵ֜לֶב <S%H2459><s%> no manner of fat שׁ֥וֹר <S%H7794><s%> of ox וְכֶ֛שֶׂב <S%H3775><s%> or of sheep וָעֵ֖ז <S%H5795><s%> or of goat לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תֹאכֵֽלוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> Ye shall eat

וְחֵ֤לֶב <S%H2459><s%> And the fat נְבֵלָה֙ <S%H5038><s%> of the beast that dieth of itself וְחֵ֣לֶב <S%H2459><s%> and the fat טְרֵפָ֔ה <S%H2966><s%> of that which is torn with beasts יֵעָשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> may be used לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to any מְלָאכָ֑ה <S%H4399><s%> in any other use וְאָכֹ֖ל <S%H398><s%> but ye shall in no wise לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תֹאכְלֻֽהוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> eat

כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> For כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> whoever אֹכֵ֣ל <S%H398><s%> For whosoever eateth חֵ֔לֶב <S%H2459><s%> the fat מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַ֨בְּהֵמָ֔ה <S%H929><s%> of the beast אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which יַקְרִ֥יב <S%H7126><s%> of which men offer מִמֶּ֛נָּה <S%H4480><s%> at אִשֶּׁ֖ה <S%H801><s%> an offering made by fire לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וְנִכְרְתָ֛ה <S%H3772><s%> [it] shall be cut off הַנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> even the soul הָאֹכֶ֖לֶת <S%H398><s%> that eateth מֵֽעַמֶּֽיהָ׃ <S%H5971><s%> from his people

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any דָּם֙ <S%H1818><s%> no manner of blood לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> are not תֹאכְל֔וּ <S%H398><s%> Moreover ye shall eat בְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> any מוֹשְׁבֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H4186><s%> in any of your dwellings לָע֖וֹף <S%H5775><s%> [whether it be] of fowl וְלַבְּהֵמָֽה׃ <S%H929><s%> or of beast

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any manner נֶ֖פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Whatsoever soul אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who תֹּאכַ֣ל <S%H398><s%> [it be] that eateth כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any דָּ֑ם <S%H1818><s%> of blood וְנִכְרְתָ֛ה <S%H3772><s%> shall be cut off הַנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> even that soul הַהִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> he מֵֽעַמֶּֽיהָ׃ <S%H5971><s%> from his people פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

דַּבֵּ֛ר <S%H1696><s%> Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying הַמַּקְרִ֞יב <S%H7126><s%> He that offereth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זֶ֤בַח <S%H2077><s%> the sacrifice שְׁלָמָיו֙ <S%H8002><s%> of his peace offerings לַיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD יָבִ֧יא <S%H935><s%> shall bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קָרְבָּנ֛וֹ <S%H7133><s%> his oblation לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD מִזֶּ֥בַח <S%H2077><s%> of the sacrifice שְׁלָמָֽיו׃ <S%H8002><s%> of his peace offerings

יָדָ֣יו <S%H3027><s%> His own hands תְּבִיאֶ֔ינָה <S%H935><s%> shall bring אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> אִשֵּׁ֣י <S%H801><s%> made by fire יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֵ֤לֶב <S%H2459><s%> the fat עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> with הֶֽחָזֶה֙ <S%H2373><s%> with the breast יְבִיאֶ֔נּוּ <S%H935><s%> it shall he bring אֵ֣ת <S%H854><s%> that הֶחָזֶ֗ה <S%H2373><s%> that the breast לְהָנִ֥יף <S%H5130><s%> may be waved אֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> תְּנוּפָ֖ה <S%H8573><s%> [for] a wave offering לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וְהִקְטִ֧יר <S%H6999><s%> shall burn הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֵ֖לֶב <S%H2459><s%> the fat הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חָה <S%H4196><s%> upon the altar וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> shall belong הֶֽחָזֶ֔ה <S%H2373><s%> but the breast לְאַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> shall be Aaron's וּלְבָנָֽיו׃ <S%H1121><s%> and his sons'

וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> שׁ֣וֹק <S%H7785><s%> shoulder הַיָּמִ֔ין <S%H3225><s%> And the right תִּתְּנ֥וּ <S%H5414><s%> shall ye give תְרוּמָ֖ה <S%H8641><s%> [for] an heave offering לַכֹּהֵ֑ן <S%H3548><s%> unto the priest מִזִּבְחֵ֖י <S%H2077><s%> of the sacrifices שַׁלְמֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H8002><s%> of your peace offerings

הַמַּקְרִ֞יב <S%H7126><s%> that offereth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דַּ֧ם <S%H1818><s%> the blood הַשְּׁלָמִ֛ים <S%H8002><s%> of the peace offerings וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֵ֖לֶב <S%H2459><s%> and the fat מִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> He among the sons אַהֲרֹ֑ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron ל֧וֹ תִהְיֶ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> become שׁ֥וֹק <S%H7785><s%> shoulder הַיָּמִ֖ין <S%H3225><s%> shall have the right לְמָנָֽה׃ <S%H4490><s%> for [his] part

כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲזֵ֨ה <S%H2373><s%> breast הַתְּנוּפָ֜ה <S%H8573><s%> For the wave וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <S%H853><s%> שׁ֣וֹק <S%H7785><s%> shoulder הַתְּרוּמָ֗ה <S%H8641><s%> and the heave לָקַ֙חְתִּי֙ <S%H3947><s%> have I taken מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מִזִּבְחֵ֖י <S%H2077><s%> from off the sacrifices שַׁלְמֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H8002><s%> of their peace offerings וָאֶתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> and have given אֹ֠תָם <S%H853><s%> לְאַהֲרֹ֨ן <S%H175><s%> them unto Aaron הַכֹּהֵ֤ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest וּלְבָנָיו֙ <S%H1121><s%> and unto his sons לְחָק־ <S%H2706><s%> by a statute עוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever מֵאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> from among the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

זֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> is that מִשְׁחַ֤ת <S%H4888><s%> This [is the portion] of the anointing אַהֲרֹן֙ <S%H175><s%> of Aaron וּמִשְׁחַ֣ת <S%H4888><s%> and of the anointing בָּנָ֔יו <S%H1121><s%> of his sons מֵאִשֵּׁ֖י <S%H801><s%> made by fire יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּיוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> in the day הִקְרִ֣יב <S%H7126><s%> [when] he presented אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> לְכַהֵ֖ן <S%H3547><s%> in the priest's office לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> them to minister unto the LORD

אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> These צִוָּ֨ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Which the LORD לָתֵ֣ת <S%H5414><s%> to be given לָהֶ֗ם בְּיוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> in the day מָשְׁח֣וֹ <S%H4886><s%> that he anointed אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> מֵאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> them of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel חֻקַּ֥ת <S%H2708><s%> them [by] a statute עוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever לְדֹרֹתָֽם׃ <S%H1755><s%> throughout their generations

זֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> likewise הַתּוֹרָ֗ה <S%H8451><s%> This [is] the law לָֽעֹלָה֙ <S%H5930><s%> of the burnt offering לַמִּנְחָ֔ה <S%H4503><s%> of the meat offering וְלַֽחַטָּ֖את <S%H2403><s%> and of the sin offering וְלָאָשָׁ֑ם <S%H817><s%> and of the trespass offering וְלַ֨מִּלּוּאִ֔ים <S%H4394><s%> and of the consecrations וּלְזֶ֖בַח <S%H2077><s%> and of the sacrifice הַשְּׁלָמִֽים׃ <S%H8002><s%> of the peace offerings

אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוָּ֧ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Which the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses בְּהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> in mount סִינָ֑י <S%H5514><s%> Sinai בְּי֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day צַוֹּת֜וֹ <S%H6680><s%> that he commanded אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְהַקְרִ֧יב <S%H7126><s%> to offer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קָרְבְּנֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H7133><s%> their oblations לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD בְּמִדְבַּ֥ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness סִינָֽי׃ <S%H5514><s%> of Sinai פ
